4.1.1.1.14. src.IOT_OperationFlattening module¶

-- coding: utf-8 --

File: IOT_OperationFlattening.py

Class IOT_OperationFlattening

Initial code was isolated from previous file flattening.py

Log:
Date Author Description
4-Aug-2018 FOE
  • Isolated minimal solution.
  • Encapsulated in class.
22-Aug-2018 FOE
  • Rebranded to capital “O” in operation; IOT_Operation
  • Improved verbosity; now using class name
23-Sep-2018 FOE
  • Updated comments and added Sphinx documentation to the class
23-Sep-2018 FOE
  • Adapted to IOT_Operation becoming abstract and new capabilities. Added method .execute, integration of operands, given operation name, deprecated method flattening.
  • External quadratic function is now a private method and rebranded as fittingQuadraticModel
1-Dec-2018 FOE
  • Adapted to new signature of inherited execute() method to accept parameters.

class src.IOT_OperationFlattening.IOT_OperationFlattening[source]¶

Bases: IOT_Operation.IOT_Operation

A flattening operation for OCTscan.

A flattening operation for OCTscan.

The operation represented by this class rectifies an OCT scan.

execute(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Executes the operation on the operands.

Executes the operation on the operands and stores the outcome in result. Preload operands using IOT:Operation.addOperand().

Returns:Result of executing the operation.
Return type:IOT_OCTscan
